scripts.test:php: wp-env run tests-wordpress --env-cwd='wp-content/plugins/cartelera-scrap' composer run punit
scripts.test:php:watch: wp-env run tests-wordpress --env-cwd='wp-content/plugins/cartelera-scrap' composer run punit-watch
scripts.db:options: npm run wpcli db query "SELECT option_name FROM wp_options WHERE option_name LIKE '%cartelera_%';"
scripts.test:listcron: npm run wpcli cron event list
scripts.test:runminicron: npm run wpcli cron event run cartelera-scrap_process_next_onetimeoff
scripts.test:runmaincron: npm run wpcli cron event run cartelera-scrap_automated_cron
scripts.test:options: npm run wpcli db query "SELECT option_name FROM wp_options WHERE option_name LIKE 'cartelera%';"
